actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to authorize the contribution of Federal funds for the establishment and operation of a National Commission on Accreditation for Corrections.

summary.text: Authorizes the contribution of Federal funds for the establishment and operation of a National Commission on Accreditation for Corrections. Authorizes appropriations of not more than $75,000 for each of the three fiscal years beginning after June 30, 1973.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the contribution of Federal funds for the establishment and operation of a National Commission on Accreditation for Corrections.
